title: DirectX error/game.cfg fix does not work (in my case)
body:
-Whenever I try to run the game **the unknown Directx error message** pops up.
-I have tried deleting **game.cfg** but it **keeps on reappearing in the config folder** when i try to run the game.
-I have **already updated all of my drivers**(graphics driver is nvidia gtx 1060, along with some other good parts, so im pretty sure my pc can run this)

I had just installed the game(I really wanted to play it and now i have the time to do so) a few days ago and I have been trying to get it working ever since.

~~(i feel like the fix to my problem is pretty simple and that I am just too dumb to know how to do so)~~

replies.body:
That game.cfg file will always be recreated, as that file deals with your configuration settings. No worries there. It's good that you've tried updating your drivers first, nice troubleshooting steps! Let's make sure you also updated DirectX as well, but I've got one more possible fix that we can try as well.

Check out the steps in this little [**DirectX error guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115006740568--May-3-Click-here-if-you-ve-crashed-and-received-a-DirectX-error-or-if-you-see-an-offset-loading-screen-), and let me know if that's what ends up fixing it!

I checked the latest version of DirectX, then I checked for updates on mine and it said that my version of DirectX was the latest

I also tried WindowMode=1, but the same error occurs.

Hmmmmm with that being the case, let's get you a little more in depth help from our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). They'll be able to dig a lot deeper to see what exactly is the main issue!
